## partialOn() function

Same as [partial()](./promizr.partial.md) but call the `task` with `owner` `this` context. If task is a string, it calls `owner[task]` function.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export default function partialOn<O, Key extends MethodNames<O>, Arguments extends PartialParameters<O[Key]>>(owner: O, task: Key, ...args: Arguments): (...args: RestOfParameters<O[Key], Arguments>) => Async<ReturnType<O[Key]>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  owner | O | <code>this</code> context to use when calling <code>task</code> |
|  task | Key | The property name of function in <code>owner</code> |
|  args | Arguments | The <code>task</code> arguments |

<b>Returns:</b>

(...args: RestOfParameters&lt;O\[Key\], Arguments&gt;) =&gt; [Async](./promizr.async.md)<!-- -->&lt;ReturnType&lt;O\[Key\]&gt;&gt;
